server.insufficient_rights: Permission "Freebox settings modification" required. Delete freebox_token.json and re-register the application granting all rights on the Freebox LCD screen.
server.insufficient_rights_short: Insufficient permission. Delete freebox_token.json and re-register the application with all rights.
server.wps_disabled: WPS is disabled on the Freebox. Enable it in Freebox OS WiFi settings.
server.no_disk: No disk available. A disk is required to create a VM.
